July 31, 2025
KayAnna M Dean
Presque Isle County Juvenile Holding Facility
267 N 2nd St
Rogers City, MI 49779-1606
Re: License #: CO711003011
Dear Ms. Dean:
Attached is the Original Licensing Study Report for the above referenced facility. The
study has determined substantial compliance with applicable licensing statutes and
administrative rules. Therefore, an original license is issued.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager Rorie Dodge-Pifer at (517) 899-6024.
Sincerely,
Jennifer Pastorick, Licensing Consultant

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
Presque Isle County Juvenile Holding Facility is located at 267 N. 2nd St. in Rogers
City, MI. The facility is attached to the Presque Isle Sheriff’s office. Upon arriving in
front of the Sheriff’s Department, the entry to Presque Isle County Juvenile Holding
Facility is to the left of the building with a sign on the tan color building. There is
parking located on the street in front of the facility.
Upon entering the facility there is an entry way with a check in area and a lock box
for law enforcement to secure their weapon and two chairs. Entering into the locked
facility through the entry way leads into an open recreation area with a table, TV,
and shelving unit which contains games and activities for the youth, and storage
cabinets containing youth hygiene products, clothing, and art supplies for youth. To
the right of the recreation area is the staff office which contains a desk, computer,
and computer monitor screens which display the facilities cameras for the recreation
3

area and bedrooms. In the office there is a secure area where the medications will
be kept as well as a refrigerator for medications. The office has a window area that
looks into the entry way of the facility. Off the recreation area on the left are two
separate bedrooms which contain a bed, a shower area which is enclosed by a
shower curtain and a toilet and sink area. In between the bedroom doors is a locked
door which houses the plumbing for the two bedrooms. Past the bedrooms is a
locked laundry room to the left where cleaning supplies are locked and secured. At
the end of the short hallway is an exit that is locked and leads into the sheriff’s office
hallway. This area will not be utilized by youth. Outside the locked door in the
sheriff’s office hallway is another locked box for law enforcement officers to secure
their weapon prior to entering the facility.
B. Program Description
The Presque Isle County Juvenile Holding Facility is a two-bed facility that provides
temporary emergency and short-term secure detainment for male and female
delinquent juveniles ages 10-17 who are experiencing serious difficulties in their
homes, schools and communities. The Juvenile Holding Facility will operate
alternating weekends including Friday, Saturday, and Sunday’s. Secure detention
placements originate from the 53rd Circuit Court Family Division, other
Family/Juvenile Courts and the Department of Health and Human Services.
Placement orders can only be issued by a Court of proper jurisdiction.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
There are currently no rule/statutory violations.
IV. RECOMMENDATION
Based on substantial compliance with the rules, it is recommended that a six-month
original license be issued.
7/23/2025

Jennifer Pastorick Date
Licensing Consultant
